Title
================

### 21201-243902 CEIA Ferromagnetic Detector or Equivalent

Reference Number: WS4361469839
---------------------------

#### Tender Details

*   Publication Date: December 22, 2023
*   Tender Closing Date: January 12, 2024, 2:00:00 PM
*   Amendment Date: December 22, 2023

#### Tender Brief

The Correctional Service Canada has a requirement to purchase 6 CEIA Ferromagnetic Detectors or equivalent to increase the capacity of detection at the Dorchester Penitentiary, Springhill Institution, and Atlantic Institution.

**Scope**

The successful bidder will be required to deliver the CEIA Ferromagnetic Detectors or equivalent to the Correctional Service Canada on or before March 31, 2024.

**Evaluation Criteria**

Bids will be evaluated on the basis of mandatory technical evaluation criteria. The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract.

**Instructions for Bidders**

*   Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation. Requests must be made to the Contracting Authority within 15 working days from receipt of notification that their bid was unsuccessful.
*   Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
*   This PWGSC office provides procurement services to the public in English and French.

**Trade Agreement**

The requirement is subject to the provisions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Regions of Opportunity**

This tender is open to bidders located in Canada.

**Regions of Delivery**

*   New Brunswick
*   Canada
*   Nova Scotia

#### Procurement Information

*   Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   Contact Person: Lisa M. Martin (SPAC/PSPC)
*   Contact Email: \[lisa.m.martin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lisa.m.martin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
